lyrics.text: Lesson 65. Jumbo versus the police. First listen and then answer the question. Why did
lyrics.translation: 第65课。小象对警察。首先听，然后回答问题。为什么

lyrics.text: the police have to push Jumbo off the main street? Last Christmas, the circus owner,
lyrics.translation: 警察必须把Jumbo从主干道上推开吗？去年圣诞节，马戏团老板，

lyrics.text: decided to take some presents to a children's hospital. Dressed up as Father Christmas and
lyrics.translation: 决定带些礼物去儿童医院。打扮成圣诞老人，并且

lyrics.text: accompanied by a guard of honor of six pretty girls, he set off down the main street of the
lyrics.translation: 伴随着六位漂亮女孩组成的荣誉卫队，他沿着主要街道出发了

lyrics.text: city riding a baby elephant called Jumbo. He should have known that the police would
lyrics.translation: 城市里骑着一只名叫Jumbo的小象。他本应该知道警察会

lyrics.text: never allow this sort of thing. A policeman approached Jimmy and told him he ought to
lyrics.translation: 绝不允许这种事情。一个警察走向吉米，告诉他他应该

lyrics.text: have gone along a side street that Jumbo was holding off the traffic. Though Jimmy agreed
lyrics.translation: 沿着一条Jumbo挡住了交通的侧街走去。尽管Jimmy同意了

lyrics.text: to go at once, Jumbo refused to move. Fifteen policemen had to push very hard to get him off
lyrics.translation: 马上出发，但珍宝拒绝移动。十五名警察不得不非常用力地推他才能让他离开

lyrics.text: the main street. The police had a difficult time, but they were most amused. Jumbo must
lyrics.translation: 主要街道。警察遇到了困难，但他们非常开心。Jumbo必须

lyrics.text: weigh a few tons, said a policeman afterwards. So it was fortunate that we didn't have to carry
lyrics.translation: 重达数吨，一名警察事后说道。所以很幸运我们不需要去搬运。

lyrics.text: him. Of course, we should arrest him, but as he has a good record, we shall let him off this time.
lyrics.translation: 他。当然，我们应该逮捕他，但是因为他有良好的记录，这次我们将放他一马。
